name: Search_Attraction_Location

docs_row.name: Search_Attraction_Location
docs_row.func_description: Find attractions by their location, address, state, country, etc. This API will return specific information like: `slug`, `productId`, `id`, etc.

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

query.description: Names of locations, cities, districts, places, countries, counties etc.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

products.title: New York Tours and New York City Sightseeing Tours.Flexible Tours
The Big Apple Coaster at New York New York Hotel and Casino
New York Tours and New York City Sightseeing Tours.Flexible Tours
The Big Apple Coaster at New York New York Hotel and Casino

response_summary:
The API response provides a mix of popular travel products and destination suggestions in the United States. For products, the first recommendation is the "New York CityPASS," which offers access to multiple attractions in New York City. The second is a flexible sightseeing tour of New York, allowing visitors to explore the city at their own pace. The third is a thrilling roller coaster ride at the New York-New York Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas.  

As for destinations, New York City stands out with 1,993 available activities, making it a major hub for travelers. Other suggestions include the smaller towns of York and York Beach, each offering 11 activities for those looking for quieter experiences. All these destinations are located in the United States, catering to a variety of travel preferences.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers seeking destination and activity recommendations. It searches locations and attractions based on a query, providing popular travel products and destination options. The response includes details like available activities, attractions, and flexible tours, helping users plan their trips. Users can filter by language for localized results, making it useful for international travel planning. The query parameter is essential for initiating the search.

enhanced_parameters.query: Search term for locations, cities, attractions, or countries.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

products.description: List of recommended travel products or attractions

ar_items.description: Details of a travel product or attraction

id.description: Unique identifier for the product, encoded in Base64

__typename.description: Type of the product suggestion, indicating it's an attraction search product

title.description: Name or title of the travel product or attraction

productSlug.description: URL-friendly identifier for the product, often used in web links

taxonomySlug.description: Category or type of the product (e.g., transfers-services, tours, attractions)

cityUfi.description: Unique identifier for the city where the product is located

cityName.description: Name of the city where the product is located

countryCode.description: ISO country code where the product is located (e.g., 'us' for United States)

id.description: Unique identifier for the destination, encoded in Base64

__typename.description: Type of the destination suggestion, indicating it's an attraction search destination

country.description: Name of the country where the destination is located

cityName.description: Name of the city or town

productCount.description: Number of available activities or products in the destination

cc1.description: Country code where the destination is located (e.g., 'us' for United States)
